author: racytech
content: I don't mean to rush anyone, just curious when approximately we can expect EOF tests on top of latest Pectra updates

author: parithosh
content: The idea is that we wait for devnet-5 spec releases, use that as break off point for client teams to rebase EOF/PeerDAS on top of pectra. I'd assume EOF tests would then go on top of the devnet-5 release.

author: _shemnon
content: The tests themselves are independent of pectra, so you could take the current 2.0 tests for eip-7692
